page.title: 14Trade
page.content:
{ BOLSOVER MARKET
{3. Which other markets do you visit? Most places visited (75%) were in the N. Derbyshire, N. Nottinghamshire and S. Yorkshire areas. Other places mentioned were Lichfield, Darlington, Liverpool, Dewsbury, Skegness, Leeds, Bradford, Wakefield and Wythernsea.
{4. How long has your business been in {the family? 3 stalls had been a family business for up to 4 generations, but the majority had been market traders for up to 10 years.
{5. Where do you live? The majority (90%) lived within a 25km radius of Bolsover, the others living in Leeds and Huddersfield. Only 2 stallholders lived in Bolsover.
